channel.title: Some nice little programs!
channel.description:
[glow=purple,10,400]If this is in the wrong spot move it![/glow] here is an nifty little program that allows you to make emotes,and movies with stick figures! heres an example: [IMG]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a361/heroflame/msn-emote008.gif[/img] you can make your own backgrounds also,remember to save all designs you make in paint as .stk or .jpeg! it also has were you can make your own stick figures without saveing them just for that animation!WOOT! HERE IT IS ill include an folder of some figures and such that i made along with some msn emotes![glow=blue,6,300]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=2G97BSXH[/glow]
Now for an really cool program,this program takes pics,and turns em to text,example: i took an pic of the text "roxas" and turned it to this=[code]
. . , ` . . . . `: .` .. .. . .. . .: , . . .: , `. , . .` . !+mNMBMMB0t_^` , . . ^"HMM@M" ^MRt ,` . ,.^@@HHM^.. BMH6. .. . , \MB@MH^ ^MBMR", ` ."@@MMB;, 'M@@@% . . . : . item.title: Some nice little programs!
item.dc:creator: @Super_m Super_m
item.description:
@Super_m wrote:

[glow=purple,10,400]If this is in the wrong spot move it![/glow]
here is an nifty little program that allows you to make emotes,and movies with stick figures!
heres an example:

you can make your own backgrounds also,remember to save all designs you make in paint as .stk or .jpeg! it also has were you can make your own stick figures without saveing them just for that animation!WOOT! HERE IT IS ill include an folder of some figures and such that i made
along with some msn emotes![glow=blue,6,300]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=2G97BSXH[/glow]
